column9: Join this fantastic small chocolate place. The lady from Portugal will help you  to take with you all these fantastic chocolates.
The third location for Ahlgrens is much smaller than the two main shops, but still very nice, and a great place to stop for some great handmade chocolates.

They have wide range of delicious chocolates. No matter what you like you can find it here. They service is implacable. Thy make me feel special every time I go there.My favorite is their special chocolate truffle. If your in town make sure to go...More
The have the highest quality of candy. Just go there and be thrilled. Excellent selection of fine candy of different sorts.
